title: [Long fliv the king]
creator_credit: Hal Roach Studios, Hal Roach and Leo McCarey
brief_description: Featuring Oliver Hardy in a bit role (before he teamed up with Stan Laurel) this silent film tells the story of a princess who upon learning the news that her father has died is given 24 hours to find a husband in order for her to become queen. Cast includes Charley Chase and Martha Sleeper. NB: Title. credits and last few feet of film missing.
